message:
Egyptian Pan rabaa platform with a group of scholars at Al-Azhar fight for legitimacy and support the legitimate President, elected Mohamed Morsi and say:

-Be patient, Sir, so keep you sold the nation's Muslims
-Dr. Hassan El-Shafei's statement salute and thank him for it
-Call Azhar to take legitimacy
-A warning to all the forces in Egypt to return their accounts, Al-Azhar has made
-Sheikh almasrawi leading the people in prayers and tarawih
-On the podium platform will oversee all Honorable Ministers resigned from the Cabinet of legitimacy
